   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Mockaron's documentation!
====================================

Mockaron is a library for mock data generation. The aim is to provide a set of
tools for demo applications and testing purposes.
The name comes from Polish word for a pasta which sounds very similar
(makaron, pronunciation: mac-r-on).

Features:

 - logo generation

Contents:

   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   getting-started
   authors
